title: Please I need your help! Ega Magazine font!
content:
Hi! I'm looking for a font with a retro flavour. I found this magazine and I'd like to ask for suggestions how to find similar fonts ("Ega" title). Thank you in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ega_6117.jpg)
author: theloneprince

comments.content: Similar: [Jaunty Gent](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/jaunty-gent-nf/), [Moonshine Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/moonshine-script-nf/) and [Pismo Clambake](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/nicksfonts/pismo-clambake-nf/) by Nick Curtis (and Erich Mollowitz on Jaunty Gent). [Commercial Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/search/Commercial+Script+/fonts/) and [Script MT](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/script-mt/) from Adobe are also similar...
Thank u very much. Gonna have a look. ;-)

Very similar to Doyald Young's [Home Run Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/doyald-young/home-run/?testdrive=custom%3D0%26seed%3D29%26dock%3D0%26size%3D203%26w%3D720%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DEga%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3Dffffff%26goodies%3D), a variation of Eclat
You could also try out 'stilla' by elsner flake fonts. It's pretty wild, but has the retro flavor.

Also [Machiarge](http://web.archive.org/web/20150413024600/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/flat-it/machiarge/) by Ryoichi Tsunekawa.

- Mike Yanega
Aww pretty cool! Thank you for the suggestions! :)
